problem.markdown:
>>True or False? You should never change your design goal.<< ( ) True (x) False
[explanation] You should continually re-visit and refine your design goal! [explanation]
problem.p: True or False? You should never change your design goal.

choicegroup.label: True or False? You should never change your design goal.

div.p: You should continually re-visit and refine your design goal!
